trans-unit.source: Serves as the abstract base class for ASP.NET file parsers.
trans-unit.target: 可做為 ASP.NET 檔剖析器的抽象基底類別。

trans-unit.source: The TemplateParser class provides the common functionality for parser classes.
trans-unit.target: TemplateParser 類別提供剖析器類別的一般功能。

trans-unit.source: Because the TemplateParser class is abstract, an instance of this class is not created directly.
trans-unit.target: TemplateParser 類別是抽象的因為這個類別的執行個體不會直接建立。

trans-unit.source: Parses the content of the file that is specified by either its virtual or physical path.
trans-unit.target: 剖析由其虛擬或實體檔案的內容路徑。

trans-unit.source: If a physical path is specified, it is used over the virtual path for locating the file to parse.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的實體路徑，則它用於移轉的虛擬路徑來尋找檔案剖析。

trans-unit.source: If the path to the file to parse is a circular reference; that is, it refers to the same file that the parser is currently parsing, an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果要剖析之檔案的路徑是循環參考。也就是說，它是指目前剖析剖析器的相同檔案<xref:System.Web.HttpException>擲回例外狀況。</xref:System.Web.HttpException>

trans-unit.source: The physical path of the file to parse.
trans-unit.target: 剖析檔案的實體路徑。

trans-unit.source: `physicalPath` has precedence over `virtualPath`.
trans-unit.target: `physicalPath`優先順序高於`virtualPath`。

trans-unit.source: The virtual path of the file to parse.
trans-unit.target: 要剖析的檔案虛擬路徑。

trans-unit.source: physicalPath or virtualPath refers to the file currently being parsed.
trans-unit.target: physicalPath或virtualPath指檔案目前正在進行剖析。

trans-unit.source: Parses the template.
trans-unit.target: 剖析的範本。

trans-unit.source: The content.
trans-unit.target: 內容。

trans-unit.source: The virtual path.
trans-unit.target: 虛擬路徑。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to ignore the filter; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>要略過的篩選器。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the template.
trans-unit.target: 傳回範本。

trans-unit.source: Reports a process error by creating a new <xref href="System.Web.ParserError"></xref> object with the specified message and adding it to a <xref href="System.Web.ParserErrorCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: 藉由建立新報告的處理序錯誤<xref href="System.Web.ParserError"></xref>物件使用指定的訊息，並將它加入至<xref href="System.Web.ParserErrorCollection"></xref>集合。

trans-unit.source: The error message text used to create a new <xref href="System.Web.ParserError"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 用來建立新的錯誤訊息文字<xref href="System.Web.ParserError"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Reports a parser exception by creating a new <xref href="System.Web.ParserError"></xref> object as the specified <xref:System.Exception> exception and adding it to a <xref href="System.Web.ParserErrorCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: 藉由建立新的報告剖析器例外狀況<xref href="System.Web.ParserError"></xref>物件做為指定<xref:System.Exception>例外狀況，並將它加入至<xref href="System.Web.ParserErrorCollection"></xref>集合。</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception> used to create a new <xref href="System.Web.ParserError"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception>用來建立新<xref href="System.Web.ParserError"> </xref>。</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception> to process is a compiler error.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception>處理會產生編譯器錯誤。</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Gets the string that contains the data to be parsed.
trans-unit.target: 取得字串，包含要剖析的資料。

trans-unit.source: The data to be parsed.
trans-unit.target: 要剖析的資料。
